title: AnastasyaKiara
author: AnastasyaKiara
created_time: February 08, 2023, 04:20:31 AMLast edit: February 08, 2023, 04:31:15 AM by AnastasyaKiara
content: Sending it from my old accountHi guys have some question, my account was suddenly was locked & banned. I'm not sure why but when i check my profile everything was changed to address, information even the profile and the alt text was said "Moderator".Bitcointalk username: dhemasmBitcointalk profile: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=1049524Archived profile page: - https://archive.fo/4EDL7- https://web.archive.org/web/20220703110550/https://bitcointalk.org/index.php%3Faction=profile;u=1049524Staked bitcoin address:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=996318.msg22386358#msg22386358BTC Address on profile page before:1Q9HgMSpgHf1GcMqHFXDp2jpRU3NmeMLtTQuote-----BEGIN BITCOIN SIGNED MESSAGE-----dhemasm from bitcointalk. I confirm my account was hacked and locked. 02/08/2023-----BEGIN SIGNATURE-----1Q9HgMSpgHf1GcMqHFXDp2jpRU3NmeMLtTIC9Y2HEIpn5tpUeDudgbqGHIbCu9heBbGQdWU30nLXPbIweMC1u45Fny8TqSg3bvl4bbDFYegR84Gwr COtrn6Dg=-----END BITCOIN SIGNED MESSAGE-----Created with blockchain.com and verified with https://brainwalletx.github.io/#verifySorry dhemasm, you are banned from using this forum!For security, your account has been locked. Email xxxx@bitcointalk.orgPS: Already sending the email that appears on the login screen.Is this normal? I'm not sure why since i didn't break the forum rules, and yeah it seems my account was hacked? Everything was changed photo, information, etc and the last online was not me too.I hope mod or admin can help me? Thank you!

comments.author: Lafu
comments.body: Your Account has posted an Fake Ann with malware download link in it on the  2023-02-07 ! https://ninjastic.space/search?author=dhemasmSo it looks like that your Account got hacked , and that the Hackers used it for posting that Malware Link !You have to wait a bit i guess for the recovery account team if they will be get to you .But you have all written what is needed for get your Account maybe recovered after the proof that you are the real owner.Is that your alt Account AnastasyaKiara Looks like that this Account that also maybe got hacked .Last post was in July 13, 2020, and now This user recently woke up from a long period of inactivity.I think that this Account is also hacked.

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: Quote from: AnastasyaKiara on February 08, 2023, 11:01:09 AMYes it was mine back then, but yeah it's hacked too.You seem to have a very big problem when it comes to basic online security, because how else can you explain that every single one of your BTT accounts has been hacked? If you get your accounts back, make sure that their password is unique, with a sufficient number of characters (random), and that you use an e-mail that will be exclusively connected to your BTT account.Do not save login data online or as plain text on a computer, and it is also not wise to log in on shared computers, nor to use publicly available Wi-Fi networks.

comments.author: AnastasyaKiara
comments.body: Quote from: Lucius on February 08, 2023, 11:42:23 AMYou seem to have a very big problem when it comes to basic online security, because how else can you explain that every single one of your BTT accounts has been hacked? If you get your accounts back, make sure that their password is unique, with a sufficient number of characters (random), and that you use an e-mail that will be exclusively connected to your BTT account.Do not save login data online or as plain text on a computer, and it is also not wise to log in on shared computers, nor to use publicly available Wi-Fi networks.Yeah my bad, anyway i'm not using plain password though. It's combined with uppercase and special character but i suppose it's not long enough or my pc just get malware again just like this case when i lose my ethereum private key https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5221759.msg53734483#msg53734483.Anyway, thank you for the advice! I Hope i will get my back account again later

comments.author: Edwardard
comments.body: Quote from: AnastasyaKiara on February 08, 2023, 12:41:23 PMIt's combined with uppercase and special character but i suppose it's not long enough or my pc just get malware againNo random guy can just guess your password easily even if its not that strong. Its someone watching or spying on you. Just clean your PC and reset everything before making new accounts anywhere again.I also suggest you to DM theymos amd Cyrus frequently to catch their attention for your case, so you can get back access to your account one day, hopefully faster. Good luck mate!

Not only did you evade the ban, but you also engaged in exchanging merits between your alt accounts.https://bpip.org/smerit.aspx?from=GabrielKiara&to=dhemasmhttps://bpip.org/smerit.aspx?from=dhemasm&to=GabrielKiaraHmm, for this one yeah it's my mistake but it's bit tricky. First, i didn't use that merit for joining, farming on some bounty campaign, selling account or anything. The simple explanation is1. You can't send image when it's newbie and i actively engaging with other people back then, so that the first reason why exchange merit with that account since it's still newbie back then when the merit implemented2. You can't send link when it's newbie and i actively engaging with other people back then, that the second reason.Yeah it's not allowed to exchange merit with my own account but that's my reason, why i use second account to engage other? the reason is a little bit stupid. I like "GabrielKiara" name rather than "dhemasm" so i try to focus on that account but yeah it's get hacked, but it's up to you to trust me or not .Basically i'm not even have a lot time to doing a full time account farming, i'm just regularly joining some proven campaign like digital gold campaign and rarely joining other campaign like from bountydetective, lauda, royse or some reputated manager also trying to busting some scam project/scammer just like you =)) as you can see on my post and thread, it's just i also have full-time work and joining bounty so it's just some side income for me while updating with the crypto condition/trend today and bountyAnd dude i'm not evading the ban, the reason was on the first post, it's said that my account was hacked and used for creating malicious ANN. I mean i'm not dumb enough if i want to farm the bct account and sell or using it for bounty but using same name with my personal Steemit and Twitter was same with Gabrielkiara and this account.Well, it's ok if i didn't get back my account that's means it was goodbye. Thank you for this 5 years i learn a lot and even get a real job because of this forum, i just want to share a clarification here, Cheers!

And i didn't even know who the hell was that, we have search feature and basically if i want to remove the "proof" before, i can login to that account and removing that post before i posting this thread since the account was not banned on the bpip, i suppose?  There is 3 simple reason.1. People want revenge because i reporting their alts (You can see my post and thread history though), i'm also just like you but don't lucky enough who have "a lot of time" to do research and report it after, and boom get a merit or some trust, but for this one you guys are rock clearing the community!2. He/she managing to much account and forgot to change the PoA was copied from my PoA as you can see here for reference https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2544574.msg52552928#msg52552928Anyway, just some leaving stuff here. I'm also doing same back then, reporting alts but yeah what's i got was my almost negative trust from timelord here https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2544574.msg57949855#msg57949855  Just want to share a quote from lovesmayfamilisQuoteA loud enough accusation, without clear evidence. You claim that these 2 accounts avoid the ban and use multiple accounts, but for this, you have to provide evidence that I cannot see in any way.Conducting single transactions is not evidence. Do not forget that you are on the forum, as well as on the Internet, and users can communicate with each other.In the future, please be sure of your accusations.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2544574.msg57950705#msg57950705Edited: In the first post we can see clearly there was dhemasm account "Posting" an random [ANN] with malicious file, did you even see that YOSHIE? Let's say If you or us are a account farmer and becoming a people that managing "A lot of that account", are you going to use the main address, even multiple times as you said where it's used basically on the main account to register on the campaign and risk it to getting banned? comments.author: Aanuoluwatofunmi
comments.body: There's no doubt your account got compromised and this is something that was caused by you at first place, you are not security conscious, if the hacker that took over your account is taking advantage of it to make shady stuffs which may talks bad of your reputation then i think you should just sign a message to claim the account back, but while doing this, you still need to be careful not to involve any person because such may be the one against you at first place, you can go through these thread for more information https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5089777.0

It's vanity address, as you can it's "1Kiara" which is just same with the account and i created it manually (not sure where i'm little bit forgot) and yes i'm still didn't know to recover my account back then. But after this case https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5221759.msg53734483#msg53734483I nulled everything from my pc, even my old data including that vanity address private key didn't get back-up ed, i can send you my conversation with Binance team about hacked ethereum adress before (It's just for reference that i didn't making drama or excuse about nulled my pc). If i can, i will sign too today but yeah i can't it anymore. Little bit different with the "dhemasm" bitcoin address since i use third party wallet on blockchain.comOk, let's clear this up a bit. You claim that you lost everything from your computer, including the private key of your vanity BTC address on around January 30, 2020. However, you also claim that GabrielKiara account was hacked around June 14, 2018, which is a year and a half prior. I don't understand the connection between these two events. You had ample time to recover your account before the claimed loss of the private key.Quote from: AnastasyaKiara on February 08, 2023, 03:05:09 PMI also lose email access that linked with the account, so not sure howThat's a lie.
